result.execSummary:
The defendant Cyd C Gilbert was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 2nd Degree Sexual Assault of Child, a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.02(2).
  • False Imprisonment, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.30.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

superMiscConds.notes: Fines, costs, and restitution are due during term of supervision.  Court further orders 50% of prison wages to be applied toward Court-ordered financial obligations.  If defendant is released with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment enforceable by all creditors' remedies shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and governmental entities for the balance due.

No contact with the victims, their family members, their residence, places of employment.
Complete a sex offender assessment and following through with any treatment or programming as recommended from
that assessment.
Comply with any/all programming as determined appropriate by the Department of Corrections.
Have no contact with individuals under the age of 21 unless given prior approval by supervising agent.
Absolute Sobriety.
Do not enter into any bars, taverns or liquor stores. Do not have any contact with.
Pay supervision fees as determined.
Provide DNA Sample.
May not possess firearm or any weapon.

records.addlTxt: from Department of Corrections.
Sentencing - October 20, 2016 - A. Klein

Defendant Cyd C Gilbert in court with attorney Perry P Lieuallen.  Defendant in custody. Shannon M. Whitworth appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Parties have received copy of pre-sentence investigation report. State recommends 30 years. Court breaks. 1:55 pm/Court resumes. S.R. addresses court. T.G. addresses court. C.G. addresses court. R.G. addresses court. Defendant addresses court. Atty Lieuallen addresses court and recommends 10 years. Court renders sentence.
From Attorney Lieuallen regarding the 9-15-2016 court date. Forwarded to Branch 2 clerk's document review.
Copy emailed to Atty Lieuallen this date
Sentencing hearing on September 15, 2016 at 09:00 am.
Sentencing moved from September 1, 2016 to September 15, 2016 at 9:00 am at the request of District Attorney's office. Clerk confirmed availability of counsel.
Sentencing hearing on September 1, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Cyd C Gilbert in court with attorney Perry P Lieuallen.  Defendant in custody. Shannon M. Whitworth appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Counsel submits a plea questionnaire and waiver.  Parties indicate that the defendant will plea to charges on 15CF0187 and charges on case 15CF0209 will be dismissed and read in.  Court examines the defendant as to the waiver.  Defendant enters a guilty plea to both counts.  Court accepts the pleas, finding them to be free and voluntary, and finds the defendant guilty as to their pleas.  Parties agree to forgoe sentencing pending a Pre-Sentence Investigation.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for September 1, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Cyd C Gilbert in court with attorney Perry P Lieuallen.  Defendant in custody. Adam Yale Gerol appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Counsel advises court that a resolution has been reached.  Requests return date for plea hearing.  Plea hearing scheduled for July 5, 2016 at 01:45 pm.
